Posts.Content: I was wondering if anyone has they same as me. I was almost finished my last period when I went on chemo. Moday March 6th will be the beginning of my 4th week on my period. I was told it would mess it up and maybe put me in menopause. I am a little concerned as I am thinking maybe a hysterectomy is the only solution.
Posts.Title: Chemo and Periods
